WorkItem.Description:
I just install V4.0.0.0 on a fresh Windows 7 Ultimate Edition (x64) workstation.  Every time I open XML Explorer, a NullReferenceException is thrown...
 
System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
at
XmlExplorer.Controls.TabbedXmlExplorerWindow.OnDownloadDataCompleted(Object sender, DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs e)
 
Any ideas?

Comments.Message: Yeah, sorry, I've fixed the code already, just need to post a new update.
Any idea when the new update will be available?
